starting_chamber: The nexus hums with dormant energy. A faint echo of a beginning.
corrupted_archive: Fragments of data float within the corrupted archive. Beware the logical rot.
empty_zone_a: An desolate void, yet hints of unseen pathways linger. The path west remains.
empty_zone_b: A vast emptiness, touched by the void. Seek patterns where none exist. The path east remains.
